data.name: Tedram Online: Car Racing & Customization Demo
data.detailed_description: In Tedram Online you can take part in electrifying races against players from around the world, on different types of tracks, customize your car the way you want and upgrade it to make it faster. In your free time, work with your friends or do other jobs to earn money to spend on your cars. In Tedram you can transform ordinary cars into extraordinary racing machines. With a wide range of parts and accessories, customize everything from the engine to the paintwork. Create unique designs and optimize your vehicle's performance to dominate the tracks. Earn money by completing various jobs spread across the city. Whether delivering goods, acting as a getaway driver in robberies, or winning clandestine races, there is always a way to fill your pockets and earn respect. When you have enough money buy a house to hide illicit things or weapons.
